comments.comments_text: Goal! Joshua Kimmich finds Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich) with a clever pass. He steps inside his man on the edge of the box and whips a tremendous shot into the left side of the goal. Fantasy football! 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Thomas Muller plays a short, square pass into the path of Leon Goretzka (Bayern Munich), who bends a shot straight into the bottom left corner to make it 2:0. Fabulous goal!

comments.comments_text: Ozan Kabak (Schalke) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Felix Zwayer didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Robert Lewandowski plays the ball to the feet of Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich), who hits a tremendous first-time shot low into the middle of the net. The goalkeeper was unable to keep it out. 6:0.
